thumb.title: [TAS] N64 Perfect Dark "Agent" by alkamaass in 24:21.26
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQDcE7wcuKs以下説明文（説明文が長いので転載元を確認ください）This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6470M TAS originally published on 2025-03-29 alkamaass ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/alkamaass) sets off to defeat the Skedar leader in record time. Please read the author's comments ( https://tasvideos.org/9566S ) for more details.
thumb.last_res_body: よそもんHERE ？ 笑うしかない
